# Edward Aggrey-Fynn

| birth_place    =
| death_date     = January
| death_place    = Cape Coast, Ghana
| position       = Midfielder
| nationalteam1  = Ghana
}}
Edward Aggrey-Fynn (24 November 1934 – January 2005) was a Ghanaian, very skillful footballer. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1964 Summer Olympics.
